item.title: AFI Fest to Host World Premiere of ’The Spongebob Movie: Search for Squarepants’
item.description: AFI Fest, presented by Canva, will take place at Hollywood’s TCL Chinese Theatres from Oct. 22–26.

item.title: Where Did All the Apple TV+ Animation Go?
item.description: Even with its ‘Peanuts’ rights, the Apple SVOD service has seemingly all but abandoned cartoons.

item.title: ‘Smiling Friends’ Gets Season 3 Premiere Date, First Look From Adult Swim
item.description: The animated series from co-creators Michael Cusack and Zach Hadel centers on co-workers Pim and Charlie.

item.title: New York Yankees Broadcasters Get Animated for Season 2 of YES Network Kids Show
item.description: ‘HexClad Presents Bronx Buds’ Returns for a second season Aug. 9, joined by guest stars and YES broadcasters Michael Kay, John Flaherty, Meredith Marakovits and Nancy Newman.

item.title: New York Yankees Broadcasters Get Animated for Season 2 of YES Network Kids Show
item.description: ‘HexClad Presents Bronx Buds’ Returns for a second season Aug. 9, joined by guest stars and YES broadcasters Michael Kay, John Flaherty, Meredith Marakovits and Nancy Newman.

item.title: James Cameron Says He Spoke to Disney About His Hopes to Expand ‘Avatar’ Franchise to Animation
item.description: The Oscar winner reveals, “I want to do an animated anthology series that’s essentially in the world.”

item.title: James Cameron Says He Spoke to Disney About His Hopes to Expand ‘Avatar’ Franchise to Animation
item.description: The Oscar winner reveals, “I want to do an animated anthology series that’s essentially in the world.”

item.title: ‘Shrek’ Donkey Spinoff Movie Firmly Happening, Eddie Murphy Says
item.description: Murphy says a film based around the fan-favorite character and his donkey family will begin recording dialogue in September, though DreamWorks hasn’t confirmed the project.

item.title: ‘Shrek’ Donkey Spinoff Movie Firmly Happening, Eddie Murphy Says
item.description: Murphy says a film based around the fan-favorite character and his donkey family will begin recording dialogue in September, though DreamWorks hasn’t confirmed the project.

item.title: ‘Despicable Me’ Writer Ken Daurio to Pen ‘Zita the Spacegirl’ Movie Adaptation (Exclusive)
item.description: Sycamore Studios is developing the feature project that counts Marvel veteran Jeremy Latcham as executive producer.

item.title: Ariana Grande, Josh Gad to Lead Dr. Seuss’ ‘Oh, the Places You’ll Go!’ Animated Movie
item.description: Jon M. Chu and Jill Culton direct Warner Bros.’ musical from producer J.J. Abrams that adapts Dr. Seuss’ final book.
